error.message: Declaration of Drupal\webform_slack\Plugin\WebformHandler\SlackWebformHandler::getLogger() should be compatible with Drupal\webform\Plugin\WebformHandlerBase::getLogger($channel = 'webform')
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to webform_slack.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
